thread.title: WPG Americas Inc. Expands Distribution of Marvell's Portfolio of Products
thread.title_full: WPG Americas Inc. Expands Distribution of Marvell's Portfolio of Products

author: admin
title: WPG Americas Inc. Expands Distribution of Marvell's Portfolio of Products
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: WPG Americas Inc. 
SAN JOSE, Calif., Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- WPG Americas Inc. (WPGA) a subsidiary of WPG Holdings, Asia's number one electronics distributor, announced today it has signed a new agreement with Marvell, an industry leader in storage, communications and consumer silicon solutions to distribute their complete line of products. Marvell's expertise in microprocessor architecture and digital signal processing drives multiple platforms including high volume storage solutions, Internet of Things (IoT), cloud infrastructure, digital entertainment, wireless, consumer and printer products. 
"On behalf of WPG Americas I am extremely honored and privileged to add Marvell to our America's line card. Marvell's product portfolio is second to none and will accelerate greater sales success and expand our customer base in the Americas. Marvell is another key supplier addition supporting our growth initiatives and go to market strategy," says Rich Davis, President of WPG Americas Inc. 
"WPG Holdings has demonstrated their success with Marvell products in Asia, and we are pleased to be expanding our relationship to now include the Americas," said Steve Quan, VP Business Operations & WW Distribution, Marvell Semiconductor. "By adding WPG Americas to our network of distribution partners, and extending our collaboration to new regions, our customers can benefit from world-class design engineering services, resources and support of Marvell's broad portfolio of silicon solutions." 
About WPG Americas Inc. Headquartered in San Jose, CA, WPG Americas Inc. is a member of WPG Holdings, a $14.9B worldwide distributor of semiconductors, passive, electro-mechanical and display products. Founded in November 2007, WPGA is a franchised partner for leading technology suppliers. As a member of WPG Holdings, WPGA is uniquely positioned to offer total solutions to its diverse customer base. WPGA continues to introduce new leading edge technologies, quality service and design-in focus through its superior engineering programs. For more information, visit www.wpgamericas.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/wpg-americas-inc-expands-distribution-of-marvells-portfolio-of-products-300164327.html 
SOURCE WPG Americas Inc.
